attributes.action: Find a way to reduce the amount of knife crime
attributes.background: The amount of knife crime has risen in the UK for the first time in ten years and must be stopped. The current law is obviously not efficient enough to stop gangs from carrying knives so a harsher law must be put in place to prevent this.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about knife crime, but we're not sure exactly what law you'd like the Government or Parliament to introduce.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might also like to sign one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/233926
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/245004
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/237702
